text:
ace="preserve">The table below details the World Championship Grand Prix results for Scuderia Ferrari's factory team-entered and privately-entered Formula One cars since 1950 in a separate list. The distinction between factory team entries and privateers is important in the early years of the Formula One championships. A third separate list details other teams for which Ferrari was an engine supplier.
Scuderia Ferrari.
Jump to: 1960 1970 1980 1990 2000 2010
The Constructors World Championship did not exist before.
Teams with Ferrari as an engine supplier.
Jump to: 1991 2000 2010
The driver did not finish the Grand Prix, but was classified (ranked), as he completed over 90% of the race distance.
Re-branded engine built with a licence from Ferrari.
Ferrari 049 engine re-branded as Acer.
